name: As Above, So Below
fact: Filmed in the real catacombs beneath Paris, the filmmakers had to acquire special permission to shoot in the restricted areas.

name: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
fact: The role of the corpse, 'Jane Doe,' was played mostly by actress Olwen Kelly to make the autopsy scenes more realistic.

name: Drag Me to Hell
fact: Director Sam Raimi returned to his horror roots after making the Spider-Man trilogy with this film, full of his signature dark humor.

name: Evil Dead
fact: The infamous 'cabin in the woods' was an actual abandoned cabin that the filmmakers renovated just enough to shoot the movie.
